title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush explains Open Line Friday for new listeners. Minneapolis moving forward on dismantling police. Blue state governors happy to destroy economy to get rid of Trump. Tiny minority of radicals is being made to look like a majority. Pew: Only 1 in 6 BLM protesters are black. Trump hemmed in by insubordinate military. Every poll shows Biden ahead, but Biden is ahead of nobody, it's all about Trump. ABC/News WaPo poll showed Hillary up 12 points on this date in 2016. Trump's dilemma is how to restore order in blue states when Democrat governors want disorder. Lincoln faced same problem in Civil War, took him 3 years to find General Grant. Trump's poll numbers went up at the beginning of calm coronavirus task force briefings. What blue state governor will stand with Trump to restore order? Deep State wants to get rid of Trump at all costs. Will Democrats stop tearing the country apart if Biden wins? No. They don't like the country and they want to destroy and rebuild it.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Do not let them shake your confidence in Trump. There is no choice but Trump. Biden says 120 million died from COVID-19. Biden's cancer non-profit was money-laundering operation, 60% of money raised went to Biden family members. Democrats think election is over, urging Biden not to debate Trump. The only way to stop Democrats is to defeat them. Radical leftists are a minority. Protecting freedom is an ongoing battle. Blue state governors can tank their economies with no concerns over reelection. Governor DeSantis has to thread the needle in a state that's half Democrats. DeSantis closes Florida bars. Coronavirus Task Force, Birx and Fauci return, give briefing.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Sidney Powell says General Flynn planned an audit of the intel agencies and that's why the Deep State had to remove him as National Security Advisor. Tim Scott tried to solve the problem of police reform. Durbin calls Scott a "token". Dems blocked Scott's bill because they want the issue, not a solution. Tucker Carlson echoes Rush on protesters, Democrat Party. Caller wants Trump to give more speeches because she thinks more people need to be reassured. Female caller requests Dittohead dating website. Nike sales plunge connected to Betsy Ross, political activism?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
